title: Add a stat()-like API to Win32 to access WSL file attributres
body: Git for Windows currently runs into problems with file attributes if you have a repo that you use both with WSL (under /mnt/c) and native Windows tooling. If it was possible to set and get Unix file attributes from Windows, it would make interop easier. This would be similar in spirit to the AF_UNIX socket support that was recently introduced.
